description:
Enter the classic world of slider puzzles, with a twist. Literally! Slide tiles to put together a picture in the quickest time possible. Plus tap the tile to rotate it! 

In this edition all the images are of beautiful women in swimwear! Over 60 lovely levels!

Try and beat your old scores, and as you get better increase the difficulty level. We challenge you to beat the impossible difficulty level! 

Have fun with our brain teaser, enjoy the catchy tune, and try not to cheat too much with the free help (3 goes in pause menu)!
